imdb.title: Burazâzu konfurikuto
imdb.plot: After Ema's dad decides to marry a woman by the name of Miwa Asahina, Ema discovers that she has 13 step brothers!

episodes.title: Brothers
episodes.plot: Ema's father remarries and she suddenly finds herself with thirteen new brothers. Today, she's moving in with them and meeting them all for the first time, so she's in for quite a day.

episodes.title: Confusion
episodes.plot: After spending a lot of time alone with her father away overseas for work all the time, Ema is enjoying being part of a big family. But she also has some interesting run-ins with Futo, the family's pop star with an attitude.

episodes.title: Promise
episodes.plot: Ema finds out what Futo wants from her. And with her father's wedding coming up, she finally meets the last of the thirteen brothers.

episodes.title: Jealousy
episodes.plot: Tsubaki and Azusa find out that the first anime they ever worked on has been renewed for a second season.

episodes.title: Submersion
episodes.plot: Since there are almost no more ingredients for dinner and very few people are able to make it home, they decide to go flower viewing.

episodes.title: Photos
episodes.plot: Futo enters to the same high school Ema goes to. The stepbrothers and Ema decide to look at baby pictures and Ema finds one of Azusa.

episodes.title: Breaking Point
episodes.plot: Futo is in a new commercial, leading the family to begin plans for an oversees trip during summer vacation in order for Ema and Yusuke to take a break from exams.

episodes.title: Nightmare
episodes.plot: Azusa collapses on the floor and Tsubaki and Ema stand there in shock, seen as in the last episode.

episodes.title: Visions
episodes.plot: Ema finds out the truth about her identity, that she is the adopted daughter of Rintarou.

episodes.title: Enlightenment
episodes.plot: As the family trip is cancelled due to everyone's busy schedule, Kaname invites every one to his buddha club event in which he is the host.

episodes.title: Love-Hate
episodes.plot: Ema is upset that her grades have dropped since returning from vacation and her entrance exam is drawing near.

episodes.title: Romance
episodes.plot: It's been a long time since Subaru left the mansion and haven't contacted anyone yet Ema is worried about him if he is having some problems in living alone, a moment Masaomi comes and tells Ema that they have just received a call from Subaru he is alright and tells her not to worry because he is not the only family member who is leaving.
